duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet and acknowledge patients at the front desk, check patients in and out of the clinic, and perform practice designated activities to support new patients.
Collect time of service payments, post payments in EPIC, and reconcile end-of-day receipts.
Coordinate information flow in and out of the clinic. Address patient calls efficiently and courteously.

Schedule, cancel, and reschedule patient appointments, procedures, and surgeries. Place reminder calls and collect pertinent information from patients in advance of their appointment per office policy.
Appropriately transfer patients to pre-registration for insurance verification per RUMG policy.
Access EPIC to retrieve referrals, orders, and other documentation and contact various outside agencies to obtain referrals and other documentation.
Coordinate administrative office functions as assigned including completion of EPIC administrative in-box messages.
Maintain and retrieve medical records per HIM and office protocol.
Problem solve issues by seeking out the appropriate resources.
Work cooperatively in a team environment.
